title: Westwood Day 2017
author: Keith Webber
content: Video from a drone of our 2017 #FIRSTSteamworks competition robot at @WestwoodDay yesterday! Great time seeing everybody!

content: Read our latest newsletter to be up to date with the latest events of the Robotics team! Scroll to the bottom of this page to subscribe.
